job_description:
Description

Role: Senior Full Stack Developer/Analyst - VB6

Location: Montreal, QC

Duration: 12 Months (Contract)

Years of experience - 5-8 Years

Bilingual: FRENCH AND ENGLISH

Roles And Responsibilities

Participate in the redesign of the transversal application ecosystem of domestic payments
Participate in a multitude of large-scale projects

Required Skills

Visual Basic 6/.NET application development, SQL Server databases
Python application development
Development of Microservices/APIs in Java with Spring Boot with JMS/IBM MQ/Kafka integrations
Excellent understanding of REST/APIs/Microservices conceptsYou master DevOps tools (GIT, Jenkins, Maven, Nexus, JUnit)
Experience in agile teams that took software development best practices seriously, such as automated testing, code review, and DevOp techniques
Experience with AWS Knowledge of management/documentation tools: JIRA/Confluence
Automation of unit and functional tests (Robot framework, ReadyAPI, Postman)
Experience with PaaS (Openshift), CaaS (Kubernetes) and Infrastructure As Code
